name: snowpack-compiler
description: Compiler for the new Snowpack RPC system
author: Max Krohn <max@ne43.com>

scripts.build-all: npm run build-parser && npm run build
scripts.test-compile: npm run build-all && node build/cli.js -l go -p example -i go-examples/2.snowp -o go-examples/2.go && (cd go-examples && go fmt . && go build )
scripts.test-compile-ts: npm run build-all && node build/cli.js -l ts -p example -i ts-examples/1.snowp -o ts-examples/1.ts && (cd ts-examples && ../node_modules/.bin/tsc --strict --target ES2020 --moduleResolution node 1.ts)
scripts.go-test: npm run build-all && (cd test && node ../build/cli.js -l go -p test -d . && go fmt . && go test)
scripts.ts-test: npm run build-all && (cd test && node ../build/cli.js -l ts -p test -d . && npm jest)
